favourite.article: When we sang this song at our small group meeting, the Spirit washed over my soul, layer after layer. It felt so good to be refreshed, revived, as I had been dry for so long. We sang it again and again until we were all satiated. Just couldn't stop drinking this Living One. This Spring rescues me every time. Thank You, Lord, for being this real; so real to us.
Lord Jesus thank You that You quench our thirst and fill our hunger!!
It will never change - only He satisfies!
I recently sang this awesome song in a home meeting for the first time in many years. It's so true... only He really satisfies.
Only You satisfy. Lord we love You. Keep us coming to You, Lord. Thank You Lord You are the same. Yesterday, today, and yes, forever, so faithful to supply.
Thank You Lord! You are our real satisfaction. Keep us filled and quenched with Yourself.
Thank You Lord, every moment in so many ways You are the sure supply!
Lord, only You satisfy. Thank You for satisfying us!
Love this song! He is the sure supply: the living spring, the water of life, the tree of life, the vine. Abide in Him!
It tells the truth. Jesus and only Jesus satisfies. God bless the writer.
Thank You Lord that only YOU satisfy!
